overview: With a firm grip on their weapons, they engage in this exciting sport where risk abounds and full contact is the name of the game. A big company with big internal communication problems. Keen to find a solution and to do some team building, the boss gives his general manager the order to send a selected group of employees off to a remote location for a weekend of Extreme Paintball. The result on group dynamics and teamwork is beyond anyone's wild dreams with a series of sexual encounters that lead to a drastic change in inter-staff relations.
title: Paintball Warriors
